component.name: PS2 Pnacher
component.summary: Applying Pnaches directly to PS2 ISOs.

description.p: PS2 Pnacher allows you to apply various patches like widescreen patches or cheats directly onto a compatible PS2 ISO.
Simply select your PS2 ISO file and the corresponding patch file (pnach) and hit "Patch!"
This program was written with the main goal to offer a Linux compatible counterpart to the original PS2 Patch Engine.

ul.li: Fixed Elf file sometimes not being parsed
